item.description:
I'm on vacation this week, so I'm making it a special two night trivia special !!!

Join us for Stump Team Trivia at JJ's Sports Bar and Grill in Northborough. Trivia starts at 7:00pm. We will meet at 6:30pm to get a spot or two, or three. Join us for drinks, food and a fun time playing team trivia. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. Please don't hesitate to walk up to me and claim your spot on our (usually) award winning team(s) !
item.name: Team trivia at JJ's sports bar and grill
